snippet: A judge said it was “an easy call” to give Ralph and Keith Stokes 25 years to life for pummeling a man in the head more than 32 times and stabbing him repeatedly with a fork.
abstract: New York State Supreme Court Justice Juan M Merchan sentences brothers Ralph and Keith Stokes to 25 years to life in prison for 2013 killing of Charles Romo in Hamilton Heights.
lead_paragraph: A judge said it was “an easy call” to give Ralph and Keith Stokes 25 years to life for pummeling a man in the head more than 32 times and stabbing him repeatedly with a fork.

headline.main: 2 Brothers Sentenced to Maximum for Killing a Manhattan Man
headline.print_headline: 2 Brothers Sentenced to Maximum for Killing
